meanings.definition: A structure in which spores are produced.
meanings.sent1: The sporangia released tiny spores into the air.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study sporangia to learn more about spore production.
meanings.sent3: The sporangia decided to throw a spore party for all its friends.
meanings.sent4: The sporangia stood tall like a spore factory in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sporangia buzzed with activity as spores filled the air.
